item.title: A snowmobiler dies after an avalanche in California's Sierra Nevada
item.description: Authorities say an avalanche in California's Sierra Nevada buried a snowmobiler in snow and killed him

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 04-18-24-51-56, Powerball: 14
